relation: I wanted to try and do this with the background from the box art, but...well...I'm bad with backgrounds.
Ness as a ninja. Complete with cracked weapon (kunai, is it? I could never remember the name of those things...)

The Night Pendant. An accessory that keeps you from succumbing to the sleep status ailment. Perfect for those long nights when you've got that really big, important term paper to finish that was worth 70% of your final grade and you had four months or so to work on it and you slacked off and left everything until the last minute. When, oh when will you ever learn?
All they wanted to do was celebrate the New Year, but it seems there was a slight miscalculation in the fireworks. No, I don't hate Lucas. Happy 2009, everybody!
